title: Puttered!
description: A 2D Golf Game written in Javascript.
aboutProject:
Puttered is a 2D golf game that was created by my friend and I as a requirement for the Mobile Game Development module of our University Course. It is based on the popular mobile game Super Stickman Golf and contains two courses, each with 9 holes to play.

The game was built for mobiles but is also playable in a desktop browser. It was written in Javascript and HTML5, using the Phaser.js framework for all the loading, rendering and general gameplay, along with Box2D as the physics engine. Each course has its own online leaderboard with playres scores stored in a MYSQL Database, which the game communicates with using a PHP layer and some AJAX requests.
